comment._content: This would seem to be outside the address 148 - 150 Castlereagh Street, Sydney since the adjacent photograph has a banner on the side of the freight cart advertising that this vehicle would be exhibited outside the said address. ref. www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/4361001187/in/pho...
